page.title: 11LIFE STYLES - D.I.Y.
page.content: LIFE STYLES - D.I.Y Mr. Fixit D.I.Y. is open from 9.00 a.m. until 8.00 p.m. There are 20,000 items which range from a screw to a complete kitchen, but all those do not include the things that can be bought in the garden centre. The whole place itself was built two years ago and has thirty-six staff who all have to be sixteen or over. With a weekly turnover of Â£25,000 the store plays an important part in the hobby life of the area. A very common occupation for the whole area is do-it-yourself which ranges from decorating a room to complex repair and renovation.
